title: Niagara Falls from the Base of Prospect Point
medium:
Recto: Graphite, brush and oxidized white gouache on blue-green wove paper.  
Verso:  Graphite
description:
Recto:  The Falls shown from the bottom of the American bank, to which a stairway leads from above.  
Verso: Very rough sketch of a tree trunk leaning against a tree; a man climbs upon the first one.
name: Drawing
